document_data.name: G'Zhorb
document_data.titles: the All-Seeing Eye{{Cite web/Boss Monsters: G'Zhorb, the All-Seeing Eye}}
document_data.mainbody: '''G'Zhorb''', which roughly translated to '''the All-Seeing Eye''' in the [[Beholder language]], was a powerful [[beholder]] in [[Undermountain]] beneath [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.History: G'Zhorb commanded a horde of beholders in Undermountain, but was himself subservient to [[Halaster Blackcloak]], the dungeon's vastly powerful master. Halaster ensured the loyalty of G'Zhorb and his minions by constructing a magical device that contained a tiny space that beholders were unable to see, threatening to unleash the imperceptible space on all of [[Faer√ªn]]. This horrified G'Zhorb, and drove him near insanity, but also ensured he remained a faithful servant of Halaster.
